title: Ahri is ridiculously overpowered
body: Complete safety, a high damage Q that passes through enemies, and a charm that lasts way too long. Its time to get this abomination out of Korea tier.

replies.body: as Much as i like ahri she is somewhat overtuned but not really overpowered as you may think. However even if she was as brken as you think she is riots poster girl so they can't exactly nerf her when they wanna make that sweet mula off those sexy skins.
Yet shes not picked or banned in competitive.. I wonder why?? Maybe because shes not as overpowered as you think? Or maybe a pro team needs to recruit you as a coach so you can tell them about ahri.

> [{quoted}](name=ChrisBrownze,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E5rMzYc3,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-06-03T05:00:14.121+0000)
>
> Yet shes not picked or banned in competitive.. I wonder why?? Maybe because shes not as overpowered as you think? Or maybe a pro team needs to recruit you as a coach so you can tell them about ahri.

Or maybe she is just a SoloQ hero, just like Kassadin. In SoloQ certain aspects aren't abused, like the lack of priority in lane of Kassadin, which will be utilized by Pro Players.

First off, dont compare Ahri to Kassadin. Kassadin is too weak early and takes too long to scale for high elo games. Ahri is nothing like Kassadin. Ahri needs to hit charm in order to get good damage off. This makes her main damage very unreliable especially against good players who are capable of baiting and sidestepping. 

So yes Ahri is good against people who don't sidestep her charm, but that doesnt make her "overpowered". Learn to sidestep and bait, instead of crying "overpowered".

> [{quoted}](name=ChrisBrownze,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E5rMzYc3,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2019-06-03T06:00:27.685+0000)
>
> First off, dont compare Ahri to Kassadin. Kassadin is too weak early and takes too long to scale for high elo games. Ahri is nothing like Kassadin. Ahri needs to hit charm in order to get good damage off. This makes her main damage very unreliable especially against good players who are capable of baiting and sidestepping. 
> 
> So yes Ahri is good against people who don't sidestep her charm, but that doesnt make her "overpowered". Learn to sidestep and bait, instead of crying "overpowered".

I don't compare her directly to Kassadin, read the post and understand that I compare her SoloQ to his SoloQ. Certain aspects don't get abused in Solo, like they do in Pro Play, like lack of Priority of Kassadin, through that not making him a very good pick.

It is a skill check. 

Either you dodge the charm or you don’t.

> [{quoted}](name=mack9112,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E5rMzYc3,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-06-03T04:57:51.010+0000)
>
> It is a skill check. 
> 
> Either you dodge the charm or you don’t.

more like dodge the charm or you die
The skill shot is easy to dodge if correctly  predicted so if they can manage to land a difficult skill shot they are rewarded.

> [{quoted}](name=mack9112,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E5rMzYc3,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2019-06-03T05:01:17.286+0000)
>
> The skill shot is easy to dodge if correctly  predicted so if they can manage to land a difficult skill shot they are rewarded.

I always like the seasons more where I don't die of one hit Skillshot.
You die you are squishy and she charms q w ignite then a ult proc with electrocute.

> [{quoted}](name=mack9112,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E5rMzYc3,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2019-06-03T06:03:55.592+0000)
>
> You die you are squishy and she charms q w ignite then a ult proc with electrocute.

He hits **one** charm and I die. I didn't write that I die from the burst of one Spell, did I?

Also, she doesn't even have to hit Q, nor her Charm if she has W Ignite, Ult and Eletrocute, lol.
what champion are you playing in where that kills you
She's always been, and somehow riot rarely nerfs her.

>Complete safety

Riot added 20 seconds to her ult the last time making it 130 seconds which is 2 minutes and 10 seconds. If you are not abusing her when the ult is on cooldown then that's your problem, also if her ult was forced to be burned defensively then she isn't making any moves till it's back up.

> a high damage Q that passes through enemies

{{champion:245}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:141}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:38}} 

Funny you're complaining about that when majoirty of assassins have at least 1 high AOE damage spell.


 > a charm that lasts way too long. 

{{item:3111}} It's like you never heard of Merc treads or {{item:3140}} before. Hell, supports can even build this {{item:3222}}  very useful item so you don't have to get QSS yourself. 

Don't want to use any of these items? Then stick behind your tank/frontliners like you're supposed to so they eat the charm instead.

If Ahri needs a nerf at all, it's going to be a nerf to Glacial Augment since that rune is so obnoxious to deal with.

Your most played champ in ranked is veigar. Obviously ahri shits on veigar, youre immobile as fuck and if you get greedy you'll die, like to any mid lane assassin. Like come on take cleanse or some shit build a null mantle ffs veigar can afford to build mr since he gets free ap. Take stopwatch rune and get biscuits or something. Youre also in the depths so you don't know how to side step. You'll improve your ability to dodge with time but you need to improve your micro. Veigar outscales ahri so if you dont int in lane she won't have much going for her unless she get glacial. Dumbshit rune. They need to get rid of that shit everyones abusing it because they're too shit to hit skill shots. 

Anyways best of luck. 

Edit: Btw she doesn't have complete safety. You make her use flash by using your e and jungle can camp the shit out of her. You make her use ult by using e and she will have no pressure. Just gotta think. In plat and diamond, players are going to know that her r is on cooldown or that she has no flash and abuse that knowledge but in silver that aint gonna happen. Ahri aint as op as you think she is. Regarding her q poke just dont stand in minion wave so she has to choose to waste mana on wave or on you, not both. 

Also korean tier? Wat? You're in na lmao

> [{quoted}](name=Original Sin,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E5rMzYc3,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2019-06-03T09:30:09.281+0000)

What do you mean lol 
I'm saying it as a 62% winrate Ahri in platinum elo in Euw for 250 games+ 
Veiger by no any means loses to Ahri
He has one of the highest MS between mages and it's Equal to some Assassins 
It's isn't Hard to dodge charm for him when she tries to all in him 
Besides once she is stuck in his cage she can't leave , she can't dash out or it

This match up is well known as an advantage for Veiger , check Ahri mains Discord 
Besides Veiger extremely outscales her in mid game and it becomes Hard for her to kill him

Your account is in eune, not euw, with a 44% wr in 16 games. Nice try. 

Then you direct me to the ahri mains discord lmfao.. youre going to tell me to listen to players in the depths that lose to veigar? 



LMFAO

Ahri shits on veigar in lane. Thats just reality.

Get good at the game bud , literally , you need to get better then after that you can complain , you are just delusional

I don't wanna be delusional like you but check your Champion {{champion:45}} 
his Aoe Q and W , and his Aoe Stun and zone last much more than Ahri's single target charm lmao
and a point click Ultimate that 1 shots anyone
Just using the main complains you said mentioned about Ahri , your champion does them better
wtf. just cc her u badie.

so op she rarely wins ad assassin match ups
so op she loses to a kid with a bear

..
53% win rate though?
i thought u were complaining about her op kit now it's a winrate problem? make up ur mind

> [{quoted}](name=Dope Solo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E5rMzYc3,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-06-03T05:07:18.494+0000)
>

balanced champ btw

I, too, like to list champion kits and try to say they're OP because of that.

Fucking use statistics or your entire argument is meaningless.

Also she doesn't even has to hit skillshots after one Item tbh.
Not hitting one instance of the Q is almost impossible, you can't miss your R, nor W damage, neither electrocute.
